version_description:
-New process of adding camera through EZ mode. It helps with adding several cameras at a same time.
-Bugs fixed.
Bug fix and user experience optimization.

Thanks for being a customer! This new version of the Geeni app contains improvements including:
- Login using your Google account
- Integration with Google Home app - link your Geeni account without an additional login!
- Support our new battery doorbell
- General bug fixes, security and stability improvements

1. Refreshed app design
2. Camera Improvements
-Jump to motion: Now, when in SD playback, you can jump directly to when motion was detected
-Improved SD card compatibility
-Improved 2-way Audio functionality
-Improved stability
3. General app improvements and stability improvements

Major update to the Geeni app. We've been listening to your feedback and making improvements!
- Support for our new Smart Doorbell, Smart Sensors, and Smart Appliances
- UI Redesign
- Major improvements to "Smart Scene" functionality
- Added concept of "Homes" and "Rooms"
- Stability improvements
- Improved app permissions
- Bug Fixes

Thanks to your support and feedback, we keep improving the Geeni app. The latest update includes:
- Security improvements
- Bug Fixes
- Improved camera connectivity
- HealthKit functionality
- Other improvements

Thanks for being a customer! This new version of the Geeni app contains improvements including:
- Login using your Google account
- Integration with Google Home app - link your Geeni account without an additional login!
- Support our new battery doorbell
- General bug fixes, security and stability improvements
This update includes enhanced compatibility with iOS 13, improved performance, and bug fixes

The latest version of Geeni offers significant improvements:

- Improved pairing
- Improved user experience
- You can now rearrange the device list
- Improved camera reliability
- Improved Smart Scenes and Automations
- Improved Help Center

Thanks for using Geeni! The latest version includes
- Try our new Widgets! Control devices or scenes from your iPhoneâ€™s widget screen.
- Hope you like our new icon
- Deeper integration with Google Assistant from within the Geeni app
- bug fixes and reliability improvements

Geeni 2.0.0 offers huge new features and improvements including:
- View multiple cameras on one screen
- Link your Geeni account to Alexa or Google Assistant
- Apple ID Login now supported
- Two-Factor Authentication now supported
- Pairing new devices is now easier than ever!
- Apple Watch Support
- UI Improvements, improved smart scene support, and more
